footer.description: Creating magical stories for amazing kids everywhere!

subtitle.aiCreates: AI creates personalized tales with beautiful pictures in seconds!

step1.title: STEP 1
step1.heading: Upload & Transform
step1.description: Upload your child's photo and watch our AI magically transform them into a story hero!
step1.security: 100% secure & private - photos are never stored

step2.title: STEP 2
step2.heading: Choose Adventure
step2.description: Pick from magical templates or create your own unique storyline. Dragons, castles, space adventures - you choose!

step3.title: STEP 3
step3.heading: Story Magic!
step3.description: Watch your personalized story come to life with beautiful illustrations. Reading time just became magical!
